程序包com.facebook.react的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • 所有程序包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback)
            • com.facebook.react.ReactActivity (implements com.facebook.react.modules.core.DefaultHardwareBackBtnHandler, com.facebook.react.modules.core.PermissionAwareActivity)
        • android.app.Service (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks2)
          • com.facebook.react.HeadlessJsTaskService (implements com.facebook.react.jstasks.HeadlessJsTaskEventListener)
    • com.facebook.react.EagerModuleProvider (implements javax.inject.Provider<T>)
    • FragmentActivity
      • com.facebook.react.ReactFragmentActivity (implements com.facebook.react.modules.core.DefaultHardwareBackBtnHandler, com.facebook.react.modules.core.PermissionAwareActivity)
    • com.facebook.react.LazyReactPackage (implements com.facebook.react.ReactPackage)
    • com.facebook.react.MemoryPressureRouter (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks2)
    • com.facebook.react.NativeModuleRegistryBuilder
    • com.facebook.react.ReactActivityDelegate
    • com.facebook.react.ReactAndroidHWInputDeviceHelper
    • com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManager
    • com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManagerBuilder
    • com.facebook.react.ReactInstancePackage (implements com.facebook.react.ReactPackage)
      • com.facebook.react.CompositeReactPackage (implements com.facebook.react.ViewManagerOnDemandReactPackage)
    • com.facebook.react.ReactNativeHost
    • android.view.View (implements android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback)
      • android.view.ViewGroup (implements android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent)
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.facebook.react.uimanager.common.SizeMonitoringFrameLayout
            • com.facebook.react.ReactRootView (implements com.facebook.react.uimanager.common.MeasureSpecProvider, com.facebook.react.uimanager.RootView)

接口分层结构

  • com.facebook.react.ReactApplication
  • com.facebook.react.ReactInstanceManager.ReactInstanceEventListener
  • com.facebook.react.ReactPackage
  • com.facebook.react.ReactPackageLogger
  • com.facebook.react.ReactRootView.ReactRootViewEventListener
  • com.facebook.react.ViewManagerOnDemandReactPackage
